result.execSummary:
The defendant Christian A Lopez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Christian A Lopez is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Christian A Lopez was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: Probation Review Hearing scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

miscConds.notes:
Pay all applicable costs and surcharges of this case, including any applicable mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections. Court found the Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable. Cash bail on deposit to apply. Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
Defendant to pay all supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.

Obtain and maintain employment.
Obtain GED/HSED.

No contact with victim, UNLESS the victim requests contact, and then only after the agent has approved a modification to no violent contact.
Defendant may have contact with the victim through a third party to arrange time with children.

Participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random screens.
Maintain absolute sobriety.
Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.

timeConds.notes:
Stayed pending a review on 10-23-15.
**2/26/2016 STAY LIFTED.  To serve 15 days. Straight time.  Commitment for condition time signed/filed.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christian A Lopez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per Commitment Order signed on 2/26/2016.

Defendant Christian A Lopez not in court.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Per email from Probation Dept., defendant is currently in absconder status.  Court ordered defendant to serve 15 days of the condition time; straight time.  Commitment For Condition Time For Non-Compliance With Probation Conditions - Domestic Violence Court signed and filed.

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Probation Agent is in court.  Probation Status Review report filed and reviewed.  Defendant is compliant or mostly compliant with probation.  The remaining condition time is stayed.  Court found that further review is needed.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for February 26, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
At the request of the probation agent, the 10/23/15 review is rescheduled to 11/06/15.   rmm
Due to not following the payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
See CCAP financial payment plan application for specific monthly due dates for this UTPPP case.
for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs signed and filed on 8/17/15.  rmm

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Defendant sentenced to serve 90 days in the House of Correction with credit for 0 days time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 18 months.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
-As a condition of probation, the Court ordered the defendant to serve 15 days in the House of Correction.  This time is stayed pending a review on 10/23/15.
-Successfully complete "Batterers intervention" counseling.
-Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment including random screens.
-Maintain absolute sobriety.
-Successfully complete any other counseling and/or treatment deemed appropriate.
-No contact with victim, UNLESS the victim requests contact, and then only after the agent has approved a modification to no violent contact.
-Defendant may have contact with the victim through a third party to arrange time with children.
-Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges of this case, including any applicable mandatory surcharges and supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Court found the Domestic Abuse surcharge is applicable.  Cash bail on deposit to apply.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.
-Defendant to pay all supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.
-Obtain and maintain employment.
-Obtain GED/HSED.
-No firearms; weapons.
-Repay Milwaukee County for attorney fees.
Received and filed: Pretrial Sentence Credit, Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief, Memorandum of Conditions of Probation.  Court advised defendant of penalties for violating the no contact order and due to this DV conviction s/he may never possess firearms or ammunition.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
AS TO COUNT 1:  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of State, Court ordered charge dismissed.  
.
AS TO COUNT 2:  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he/she is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Final Pretrial held.  Case remains set for jury trial on 6/01/15 in Branch 40.  Court reminds defendant the no contact order remains in effect.

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Michael Christopher Schindhelm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Attorney Fee Trust - Escrow payment plan created 03/13/2015 to repay Milwaukee County $50.00 monthly for attorney fees. First payment commencing 05/01/15.

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court.  Evan K Glaberson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Case set for pretrial conference.  Indigency hearing proceeded.  Court makes a finding that defendant is indigent.  Court appoints Hazel Washington as counsel for defendant at the rate of $60.00 per hour.  Attorney Washington accepts appointment.  Order signed and filed.  Defendant shall reimburse Milwaukee County at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/01/15 until paid in full. Order signed and filed.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40. Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Status conference scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-12-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Christian A Lopez
Current: 3325 West Lynndale Avenue, Greenfield, WI 53221   (Effective: 02-23-2015)
Prior: 2137 West College Avenue #708, Oak Creek, WI 53154
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

As an additional condition of bail:
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kara C.    AND/OR    Adam M.    AND/OR  their residences    AND/OR  their places of employment

No weapons
No firearms

Defendant Christian A Lopez in court.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
OCCR Tape #15-036

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 

Defendant informs he will be retaining counsel.  The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 40.
Clerk:  jms
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 02-23-2015 at 01:30pm
